EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 4 - White Paper & Exec Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: Instant scalability with AirScale Cloud RAN – White Paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AirScale Cloud RAN delivers total flexibility to meet 5G and IoT demands AirScale Radio Access Think fast, act fast with AirScale Cloud RAN Read the White Paper <[[https://pages.nokia.com/1760.Airscale-CloudRAN.html]]> Think of the competitive advantage of launching a new service with a lead time of days instead of months. The dream is now reality.
Prepare for the 5G era with a multi-layer, Cloud-ready RAN comprising a mix of large centralized sites and distributed locations for greater agility and shorter innovation cycles, all with lower costs.
Nokia AirScale Cloud RAN <[[http://networks.nokia.com/portfolio/solutions/telco-cloud/nokia-cloud-based-radio-architecture]]> supports distributed and centralized deployments, or a combination of both, using multiple fronthaul types, including Ethernet. AirScale: multi-layer and cloud-based, ready for 5G Now you can migrate seamlessly to the Cloud RAN using your existing radio network architecture and investments.
Cloud-based Nokia AirScale Radio Access gives you the ultimate flexibility to instantly scale up and react to the demands of 5G and IoT. So you can win revenue immediately. Read the Executive Summary <[[http://networks.nokia.com/sites/default/files/document/nokia_airscale_cloud_ran_executive_summary.pdf]]> ©2016 Nokia.
